name: Coin Mania (webtolich)
description:
Greetings, my little coin lover!

You'll have a minute and a half to collect as many coins as possible in this arena and unlock a few secrets to gain access to more expensive coins. It will take you more than once to learn how to collect a lot of coins, but it's worth it!

I hope you enjoy the game and wish you luck!

Arrow keys or WSAD to move and spacebar to interact.

You can finish the "Tutorial" section for a better understanding before you play.

This is my very first game and I am exciting to hear your opinion about it.
